system.availability:
Master-Crafted Relic Tome of the Deathwatch. A Tome of archives, templates, and lore of the Mechanicus. Difficult to navigate and study, but possessing lots of information.
Grants +10 to Forbidden Lore (Mechanicus), and +2d10 to Tech-Use Tests (roll each  time).
system.cost: Can only be Requisitioned by Techmarines
